title: Underread and Underrated
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> **Underread and Underrated** is currently being reviewed with regards to its continuance in its original state. We would like to thank everyone for their efforts in this project, and we hope to continue it or something similar in the future. ~ WhiteGuard, Community Outreach

[[footnoteblock]]
------

[[module CSS]]
.wiki-content-table td:nth-last-child(1){
    width: 3ch;
}
.wiki-content-table td:nth-last-child(2){
    width: 12ch;
}
.content-panel .content-type-title > p {
    margin: 0;
}
.content-panel .content-type-title {
    /*font-size: 120%;*/
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 2px 10px;
    background-color: #666;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 9px 9px 0 0;
    box-shadow: inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.3),
                inset 0 10px rgba(255,255,255,0.2),
                inset 0 10px 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.25);
}
.content-panel .content-type-description {
    padding: 0;
    text-align: justify;
}

.content-panel .wiki-content-table {
    margin: 2px 0 0 0;
    width: 100%;
    word-break: break-word;
}
.content-panel .wiki-content-table th:nth-of-type(2),
.content-panel .wiki-content-table th:nth-of-type(3),
.content-panel .wiki-content-table td:nth-of-type(2),
.content-panel .wiki-content-table td:nth-of-type(3) {
    text-align: center;
}
.content-panel .wiki-content-table th,
.content-panel .wiki-content-table td {
    border: none;
}
.content-panel .wiki-content-table tr {
    border-bottom: solid 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}
.content-panel .wiki-content-table th {
    border: 2px solid white;
    border-width: 0 2px;
    background-color: #666;
    color: white;
}
.desktop-only { display: block; }
.mobile-only { display: none; }
@media (max-width: 979px) {
    .desktop-only { display: none; }
    .mobile-only { display: block; }
}
[[/module]]

[!-- SCP Block --]

[[div class="feature-block desktop-only"]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone left-column"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Young and Under 30
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages separate="no" tags="scp, -archived, -in_rewrite" created_at="last 180 day" order="random" rating="<=30" urlAttrPrefix="yau30"]]
* %%title_linked%% [+%%rating%%]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-footer"]]
  [!-- Placeholder --]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Tale/GoI format/Art Block --]

[[div class="content-panel standalone right-column"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Old and Under 30
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages separate="no" tags="scp, -archived, -in_rewrite" created_at="older than 180 days" order="random" rating="<=30" urlAttrPrefix="oau30"]]
* %%title_linked%% [+%%rating%%]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="panel-footer"]]
  [!-- Placeholder --]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
